for _ in range(int(input())):
    x,n = map(int,input().split())
    reach = [0]*(x+1)
    reach[0] = 1
    i=1
    while i**n<=x:
        j = 1
        while j+i**n<=x:
            j+=1
        j-=1
        while j>=0:
            if reach[j]>0:
                reach[j+i**n]+=reach[j]
            j-=1
        i+=1
    #print(reach)
    print(reach[-1])
